item.title: Baker Street
item.description: Baker Street is a natural deduction tool for macOS written in Swift. It is open source and you can view the code on Github. Manual Download. Overview Available for macOS (10.12 -), Baker Street is a free-form tool that helps you produce natural deduction proofs in propositional logic. Use Baker Street to enter your proof, check for errors, clarify relationships between proof lines, preview, and export your proof in several formats.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Ian. I live in Canterbury with my wife and several gerbils. Following a successful career in academic psychology researching psycholinguistics and creativity1, I’m now enjoying opportunities and challenges in my first love, software development. I enrolled on the University of Kent’s MSc in Computer Science2 in September 2019 and graduated in 2021with distinction. I’m currently working as a software developer at Literature and Latte. Check out my CV/PhD.
